A portfolio template used to showcase your skills, work experience, and projects as a developer.

### Features

- Hero Section
- About Section
- Work Section
- Education Section
- Projects Section
- Hackathon Section
- Contact Section
- Blog

### Tech Stack

  ]}
/>
